name: Al Hameed
description: Al Hameed is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The Praiseworthy.' It denotes Allah's perfection, worthiness of praise, and the excellence of His attributes.
summary: The name Al Hameed emphasizes the significance of Allah's nature as deserving of all praise and commendation. It recognizes that all good qualities and actions originate from Him, and humanity is encouraged to acknowledge and express gratitude for His blessings. The term comes from the Arabic root 'á¸¥-m-d,' which relates to praise and commendation.
